oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Highlander Folk School: Communist Training School
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Newspaper from Georgia Commission on Education referring to Highlander Folk School as a "communist training school." The centerfold shows pictures of training workshops, musical sessions, and dancing at Highlander. This piece of segregationist propaganda enraged white supremacist groups which led to the investigation of Highlander by the Tennessee General Assembly.

The Georgia Commission on Education was an arm of the Georgia state legislature established to preserve segregation. Many segregationists labeled desegregation attempts as communist, a popular attack of the era.
